input_description.intro:
Input data format: { } = optional, [ ] = it depends, | = or
Purpose of oscdft_pp.x: This calculates the occupation numbers, eigenvectors, and matrices as a post-processing program. REQUIRES the oscdft.in file in the same working directory as where the oscdft_pp.x command is ran.
Structure of the input data: ===============================================================================
&OSCDFT_PP_NAMELIST ... /

var.name: outdir
var.info: directory containing the input data, i.e. the same as in pw.x
